page.title: 03Townscape - a child's view.
page.content: {Woodbridge}is a lovely place. It has a river which most towns don't have. There are swans on the river and sometimes people feed them. Across the river is{Sutton Hoo}where a Viking ship was buried. Some people sit and paint the river and the lovely view. It is nice to go to the{Riverside {Theatre}with its new blue seats which came from France and you can pop in there for a coffee. It is fun at the {Deben Swimming Pool.}There are lovely places for children to play like{Fen} {Meadow, Kingston Field and Elmhurst } {Park.}In winter we sledge down the Fen. Many little grocer's shops have been replaced by supermarkets. There are now lots of antique shops and Building Society Offices. The library has a children's section and you can borrow music and story tapes. {St. Mary's.}
